HPI 8588 Nissan Skyline GT-R 1991 Highland Group A 300km Race 4th place T. Okimoto/E. Yamada



Tatsuhara Okimoto and Eiji Yamada drove this Skyline GT-R in only 2 rounds of the 1991 Japanese Touring Car Championship (rounds 3 & 4). According to HPI’s blog, this is a model of the minimally liveried car as raced in Round 4 where Okimoto & Yamada finished in 4th place. For whatever reason, these are the only 2 touring car events that Okimoto & Yamada ever competed in.

If you check out the March 5, 2012 entry in HPI’s blog (link below) you can see thy had plans to release the 1991 Bathurst winner but that never happened.
